entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: The Game of Life 2
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life CollectionÔºö‚Ç∫1.299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫899,99 [‚Ç∫899,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.299,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫79,99

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life CollectionÔºö‚Ç∫899,99
  • Mothgirl OutfitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Tunneler ShipÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Foxman BikeÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Action Car AvatarÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Super Pet AvatarÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Magical Girl OutfitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Skyscraper AvatarÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Foxman OutfitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Super Hero World BundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now! Voted "Best Digital Board Game‚Äù in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021 Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It‚Äôs a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don‚Äôt. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts! Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. ‚Ä¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams ‚Ä¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat ‚Ä¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions ‚Ä¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese ‚Ä¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI ‚Ä¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game ‚Ä¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? It‚Äôs your LIFE PATH Get married or don‚Äôt, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It‚Äôs super easy to set-up and play: ‚Ä¢ Create your free private account ‚Ä¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups ‚Ä¢ Start games straight from those chats ‚Ä¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are It‚Äôs simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Hitman Sniper
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Starter PackÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

In-App Purchases

  • Limited Time OfferÔºö‚Ç∫699,99
  • Extra Large Tokens PackÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • Extra Large Money PackÔºö‚Ç∫349,99
  • Promo BundleÔºö‚Ç∫999,99
  • Starter PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Medium Money PackÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

Application Description

BECOME THE ULTIMATE SILENT ASSASSIN Step into the shoes of Agent 47 in Hitman: Sniper and discover the most compelling sniper experience on mobile. TACTICAL MISSIONS IN MONTENEGRO Hone your strategic skills and orchestrate the perfect assassination. ACTION ZOMBIE CHALLENGE IN DEATH VALLEY Prepare for non-stop action in a true test of your accuracy and speed of execution. MORE THAN 150 MISSIONS AND 11 DIFFERENT CONTRACTS Improve your strategy for the perfect assassination as you uncover secrets and subterfuges. 17 UNIQUE WEAPONS Eliminate targets, collect weapon parts and complete blueprints to unlock the most powerful rifles. COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS TO DOMINATE THE LEADERBOARD Boost your score and climb up the ranks to become the world's finest silent assassin. Hitman: Sniper is memory intensive. Devices such as iPad 2, iPad Mini, iPhone 4S and iPod Touch 5th Generation will suffer from occasional dips in performance and will not support Everyplay.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Rebel Inc.
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Command PackÔºö‚Ç∫399,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫299,99 [‚Ç∫299,99 ~ ‚Ç∫499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Early Unlock CheatsÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Command PackÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • Early Unlock Cheats (discount)Ôºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • All Advisors UnlockÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Region TourÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • The Black Caves ExpansionÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Campaign + ChallengeÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Private Donor UnlockÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Can you stop the Insurgency? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique and deeply engaging political/military strategic simulation. The war is ‚Äòover‚Äô - but we all know that doesn‚Äôt mean anything. To stabilise the country, you need to balance military and civilian priorities to win the hearts and minds of the people, whilst also stopping insurgents from seizing power! Rebel Inc. is the brand new game from the creator of ‚ÄòPlague Inc.‚Äô - one of the most popular paid games ever with over 130 million players. Brilliantly executed with beautiful graphics and critically acclaimed gameplay - Rebel Inc. offers a deeply engaging, strategic challenge inspired by the complexities and consequences of modern counter insurgency. ‚óà‚óà‚óà #1 top paid game globally ‚óà‚óà‚óà ‚ñ∂ ‚ÄúRebel Inc. lets everyone wrestle with the messy challenges of post-conflict recovery and better understand the complex realities of building peace.‚Äù - World Bank Global Lead for Stability, Peace and Security ‚ñ∂ "Highly rewarding spiritual sequel to one of the App Store's biggest hits." - Pocket Tactics ‚ñ∂ "Surprisingly sophisticated... even better than some of the stabilization training software I have seen in government use" - PAXsims ‚ñ∂ "Rebel Inc. is fascinating and fun" - 148Apps.com ‚ñ∂ "Another great game and a worthy successor to Plague Inc" - App Store review ‚ñ∂ "If you love strategy games then this is the game for you" - App Store review ‚ñ∂ "Brilliant game, the gameplay is interesting and the strategy is intuitive!" - App Store review ‚ñ∂ "Unlike anything I‚Äôve played on here before" - App Store review ‚óà‚óà‚óà Features: ‚óè Stabilise 9 richly modeled regions ‚óè Innovative representation of counter insurgency tactics ‚óè Fund realistic initiatives to empower the local government ‚óè Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world based on extensive research ‚óè Intelligent strategic and tactical AI ‚óè Sophisticated narrative algorithms shaped by your decisions ‚óè 8 unique governors with radically different abilities ‚óè Conduct large-scale Operations in Campaign mode ‚óè Play new generated Challenges every week ‚óè 13 Official Scenarios including disease outbreaks, helicopters and advanced insurgents ‚óè Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system ‚óè Full Save/Load functionality ‚óè Internet connectivity not required An important note: Although a fictional game, Rebel Inc. looks at important real world issues and we have made every effort to deal with them sensitively. The game has been extensively researched and has been developed in cooperation with leading regional politicians, business people and journalists as well as international charities, experts and governments. Rebel Inc. is now fully localised in English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), and Russian. Special sale price to celebrate the launch of the game! ‚óà‚óà‚óà I‚Äôve got lots of plans for updates! Get in touch and let me know what you want to see. James (the designer) Contact me here: www.ndemiccreations.com/en/1-support Follow me on Twitter: www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Annual Premium SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫179,99 [‚Ç∫179,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • ÊúàÂ∫¶È´òÁ∫ßËÆ¢ÈòÖÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Annual Premium SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • Âπ¥Â∫¶ËÆ¢ÈòÖÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • ‰πêÊ°•ÁªàË∫´‰ºöÂëòÔºö‚Ç∫349,99
  • ËøûÁª≠ÊåâÊúàËÆ¢ÈòÖÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Revitalize your Apple Music library! TuneShift intelligently matches your cherished music from NetEase Cloud Music and QQ Music to Apple Music platform. Say goodbye to tedious manual searching. With just a few simple steps, rediscover your complete music collection on Apple Music. Our smart engine ensures you find the closest matches to your original favorites. Core Advantages: ‚Ä¢ Premium music matching engine for precise track identification ‚Ä¢ Preserve complete collection structure and playback order ‚Ä¢ Real-time progress display ‚Ä¢ Minimalist design with one-click operation Privacy Protection: We prioritize user privacy, strictly adhering to privacy protocols to ensure your account information remains secure. Why Choose TuneShift: Professional music identification technology Superior matching accuracy Swift processing efficiency User-friendly interface Let TuneShift be your professional music management tool for the perfect Apple Music experience! Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: Classic Maze Game for Watch
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫4,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫4,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Classic Maze game is a classic puzzle game, perfect for training your brain during a short break. It is designed as a very simple single player game played by sliding through fun retro mazes. Play a quick game and challenge 500 mazes to become the maze king.

entry.title: Money Pro: Personal Finance AR
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • PLUSÔºö‚Ç∫799,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫199,99 [‚Ç∫199,99 ~ ‚Ç∫999,99]
  • GOLDÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫399,99 [‚Ç∫399,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

In-App Purchases

  • PLUSÔºö‚Ç∫199,99
  • GOLDÔºö‚Ç∫399,99

Application Description

EASY BUDGET. Cut your expenses with Money Pro¬Æ! Expense tracker, budget planner & account manager - all in one app to get your finances under control. Money Pro works great for personal & family expense tracking. Easy sync and iPhone/iPad versions combined in one app. Money Pro is the next generation of the Money app (over 2 million downloads worldwide). FEATURES: Simple and Secure - quick and easy expense/income entries: save your time - password & backups of your data Income and Expense Tracker - split transactions: split one payment into multiple categories, keep it all organized - search by amount, category, description, payee, cheque number, etc - recurring expenses with custom periodicity - calendar for scheduling bills and expenses for the whole year ahead - notifications & alerts for bills due - tracking expenses with family members and cross-platform syncing* (PLUS or GOLD subscription required) - multiple profiles for organized tracking of personal and family finances - attachment of receipt (or any other) photos: keep important bills captured Budget Planner - flexible structure of categories & subcategories with over 1,500 built-in icons - custom periodicity: start your budget from any date - visual indicators for budget spending - transaction list for each category: access your bills with ease - transferring the leftover of the previous budget period to the current one to limit your spending - unique icons with your photos Account Manager - easy management of an unlimited number of accounts - balance change history - additional fields for organizing your records: payee, description, check #, class (personal/business travel expenses). - import of bank statements (files: OFX, CSV) - online banking (GOLD subscription required) Insightful Analytics - eight different reports - filter customization - quick and easy date selection Augmented Reality - build three-dimensional charts right on your table with AR reports (GOLD subscription required) Goals - set your goals and achieve them - visualize your goal progress with a trend chart - four Goal types: Save money, Pay off debt, Reduce expenses, Increase income (GOLD subscription required for last three) More - calculator and currency converter - print and export to PDF, QIF, CSV formats - multiple currencies & automatic update of exchange rates - iCloud sync for iPhone, iPad, Mac (no subscription) - support service & user guide (https://money.pro/guide/) PLUS subscription - 1 Month of PLUS: $4.99 GOLD subscription - 1 Month of GOLD: $9.99 In all the countries (except the USA), actual charges will be converted to the local currency. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Terms & Privacy - http://ibearsoft.com/privacy.html - http://ibearsoft.com/terms.html Money Pro is a Universal app. Pay once and use it on your iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch. *See App Support for further details

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. ‚Ä¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams ‚Ä¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat ‚Ä¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions ‚Ä¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese ‚Ä¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI ‚Ä¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game ‚Ä¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? It‚Äôs your LIFE PATH Get married or don‚Äôt, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It‚Äôs super easy to set-up and play: ‚Ä¢ Create your free private account ‚Ä¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups ‚Ä¢ Start games straight from those chats ‚Ä¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are It‚Äôs simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

entry.title: DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫999,99 [‚Ç∫449,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.299,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫999,99

In-App Purchases

  • All-in-One PackÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • New Content! Pixel RingÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Boss Monster Model SetÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • New Content! Astronomy SetÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • New Content! Magic CarpetÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Explore a world made of blocks as you gather, craft, and build to defeat the evil Dragonlord! Build everywhere from anywhere in DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS, available now on mobile. Brought to you by SQUARE ENIX! ‚óÜ TRAVEL AND EXPLORE THE VAST WORLD OF DRAGON QUEST! In this ‚ÄúBlock-Building RPG‚Äù, YOU are the legendary builder that has the power to build! The realm of Alefgard has been plunged into darkness by the terrible and treacherous Dragonlord, the ruler of all monsters. Venture off on the epic adventure to restore Alefgard! ‚óÜ FACE OFF AGAINST VICIOUS FOES! You will encounter Slimes, Golems, Dragons, and more. Familiar DRAGON QUEST monsters of all sizes threaten the survival of humankind! Craft weapons, build defenses, and fight the monsters to protect your base. Use your power to build and play smart when fighting against frightening enemies in action packed combat! ‚óÜ GATHER, CRAFT AND BUILD FROM ANYWHERE! In this world made of blocks, everything you see can be materials used to create! Farm ingredients, craft various items and build your base to unite the people roaming the ruins. From buildings to entire towns, you have the freedom to make your village your very own. The power to build is in the palm of your hands! ‚óÜ BUILD BETTER ON MOBILE WITH SPECIAL FEATURES ADDED! Place blocks by simply tapping the screen and destroy blocks and items more easily with specialized cursors. A convenient Undo Button function has also been added to allow you to restore your work! Convert your buildings in to Build Cards to share with friends and scan their buildings to have them show up in your island! ‚óÜ NEW DLC AS IN-APP PURCHASES New DLC added in ‚ÄúTerra Incognita,‚Äù the land where you can freely build and play! DLC includes: ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúMagic carpet‚Äù, ‚ÄúBoss figure pack‚Äù, ‚ÄúCelestial pack‚Äù, ‚ÄúDot ring‚Äù ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúAll in one pack‚Äù (A set of the above 4) *Please be aware of duplicate purchases. "OS: iOS 13 or later iPhone 8 or later (minimum 3GB of RAM)" *Playing this game on a non-recommended device may result in unexpected errors, such as crashing due to insufficient memory. Please be aware that we may not be able to provide support for non-recommended devices.

It‚Äôs a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don‚Äôt. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. entry.title: Motorsport Manager 4
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

In-App Purchases

  • Very Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Huge InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Premium livery bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

Application Description

Revitalize your Apple Music library! TuneShift intelligently matches your cherished music from NetEase Cloud Music and QQ Music to Apple Music platform. Say goodbye to tedious manual searching. With just a few simple steps, rediscover your complete music collection on Apple Music. Our smart engine ensures you find the closest matches to your original favorites. Core Advantages: ‚Ä¢ Premium music matching engine for precise track identification ‚Ä¢ Preserve complete collection structure and playback order ‚Ä¢ Real-time progress display ‚Ä¢ Minimalist design with one-click operation Privacy Protection: We prioritize user privacy, strictly adhering to privacy protocols to ensure your account information remains secure. Why Choose TuneShift: Professional music identification technology Superior matching accuracy Swift processing efficiency User-friendly interface Let TuneShift be your professional music management tool for the perfect Apple Music experience!

entry.title: 8mm Vintage Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫1.799,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫119,99 [‚Ç∫119,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.799,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫119,99
  • Silent Film ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Light Leak ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Countdown ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00

Application Description

8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man! We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc. 8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger. SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS ‚Ä¢ Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies ‚Ä¢ Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style ‚Ä¢ 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm ‚Ä¢ 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes ‚Ä¢ Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription ‚Ä¢ Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes ‚Ä¢ Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect. ‚Ä¢ Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION - Apply film and frame effects to clips - Trim video, pan & zoom photo - Add a soundtrack from your music library - Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions 8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION - You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates - Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you‚Äôll be charged an annual subscription fee - Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off
